text:

seungcheol mendorong pelan dada mingyu, menyuruhnya untuk bersender pada dinding di belakangnya. dengan posisi seperti ini, seungcheol lebih mudah untuk membuahi mingyu.
trans:

For God's sake, Mingyu's body size was bigger than Seungcheol's body!

Mingyu followed him to look at it. Shit. His body was so messy thanks to this intimacy.
Seungcheol gently pushed Mingyu's chest, letting him lean against the wall behind him. It was easier for Seungcheol to fuck Mingyu in this position.
